bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Repair and Rewinding of Motors for the Petroleum and Chemical Industry
IEEE Recommended Practice for Repair and Rewinding of Motors for the Petroleum and Chemical Industry

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: General recommendations are provided for users of motors that need repair as well as owners and operators of establishments that offer motor repair services. The use of this recommended practice is expected to result in higher quality, more cost-effective, and timely repairs. Guidelines are also provided for evaluating repairs and facilities.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
